1.content:
No adults.

It was like music to their ears. It was all the encouragement the kids needed to immediately go nuts with their own rules. They ran rampant in the streets. The schools were empty. The movie theaters were packed. The park was a mess. Kids aged 0 - 18 ran around, having water fights, playing football in the empty streets and much much more.

The local fast food joints were going nuts too. As it was mostly teenagers who worked there anyway, they didn't shut down like mostly everything else. The teens took it upon themselves to feed their fellow kids. They fried up burgers all day, playing music, laughing and having a good time. They weren't getting paid, but then, what was the point? They didn't need to pay for anything anymore without adults to reinforce the monetary system.

So Penny Proud and Dijonnay Jones went and hung out at McWizard Burger all day. They went straight to the self-serve cola dispensers and loaded up at least sixteen cups of cola each. Just completely on impulse, they filled them up, stuck in some straws and headed for an empty booth near a window.

With matching grins, they set to work.

Hours later, they weren't even talking to each other. They were just slurping down the last of their sodas, leaning back and relaxing with contented grins on their faces as they chugged. As they slurped, they quietly relished the gurgling and groaning coming from their respective bellies. After sixteen cups for both of them, their stomachs had stretched out considerably.

Penny's gut was poking out from beneath her white blouse, stretching her burgandy skirt around it, pressing up into the table. Dijonnay's stomach, which had been pretty round to begin with, was even larger. Her own purple blouse was stretched around it, with her own blue skirt stretched as well.

Finally, they were slurping out the very last of the soda pops, and they removed the straws from their mouths and let out twin contented sighs. They set the empty cups down and gingerly pat their respective tummies, which sloshed their loads a bit. They looked at each other, both tired and wound up at the same time after consuming so much sugar. They both belched loudly, and then looked at each other.

Now what?

info.brief_description: A continuation of a five second scene from "Tween Town" where Penny and Dijonnay get fat.
info.description:
Some of you may recall an episode of The Proud Family where Penny Proud wishes all the adults would vanish. This wish is brought true by, surprise surprise, Al Roker. The kids, of course, go wild, doing whatever they want, whenever they want, including eating junk food all the time.

Penny and her best friend, Dijonnay Jones, took advantage of this, it would seem, because we see them in the local burger joint, binge-drinking on soda pop. They are leaning back, relaxed and content, and their bellies are swollen out from under their shirts.

The scene lasts for only a few seconds in the actual show, and they're shown to have returned to normal the next time they're onscreen. But this story allows you to lengthen that scene to whatever length you like and go in any direction. They can get fat alone, or you can add more friends to the mix. No adult supervision whatsoever. They can do whatever they want.

So have fun with it.
info.pretty_title: Proud Family Weight Gain: Tween Town
